title: Model Major Structural Faults
description: A mine geologist models the major faults in a deposit, as they can control mineralization and impact rock stability.

tasks.description: Interpret and pick the fault locations on multiple cross-sections using drillhole and seismic data.
tasks.expected_outcome: The fault traces are identified on 2D sections.

tasks.description: Create a 3D wireframe surface for each major fault by stitching together the 2D interpretations.
tasks.expected_outcome: 3D models of the fault surfaces are created.

tasks.description: Incorporate the fault models into the main geological block model to constrain the resource estimate and inform the mine design.
tasks.expected_outcome: The block model and mine plan are updated to honor the major structural controls.
